document_data.caption: Map showing Calling Horns near the midpoint of Evermoor Way. Click to enlarge.
document_data.name: Calling Horns
document_data.mainbody: The '''Calling Horns''' was an inn, and later small settlement, south of the [[Evermoors]], along the [[Evermoor Way]] east of [[Yartar]] where the [[Jundar's Pass]] trail struck out south.
document_data.History: It was named after the legendary battle where an army of [[humans]] and [[dwarves]] united to defeat the last army of [[trolls]].
document_data.Staff:
Circa [[1365 DR]], it was run by a hunter named [[Tosker Nightsword]].

After [[1485 DR]], the Calling Horns Inn was owned and run by [[Tamalin Zoar]], expanding the location into a small settlement.
